page.title: 09School Life CARSHALTON,Sry.
page.content: Beep, beep went the alarm.It is 7.35am I get dressed into my school uniform, knee height grey pleated skirt, short sleeved white shirt and tie, with a grey cardigan to complete. Breakfast is when I get downstairs and the meal consists of cereal, egg and toast and tea or orange juice. Then to slip on my shoes and pack my bag and time to leave.I call for my two friends on the way. The first thing we do when we get to school is to put our packed lunches into the little room.At around 9.OO we go in.It is Thursday so we have radio assembly. At lO.3O it is playtime, l5 minutes to enjoy myself.Then maths with our head teacher.l2.OO with lunch on the way we run outside to work up an appetite.In the afternoon we have games on our field,then creative writ_ ing.3.25 is hometime with a dash home for tea and then to gym club. Bed 9.3O
